name: Duck Hunting Pro Challenge-Bird Shooting Game 3D
name_original: Duck Hunting Pro Challenge-Bird Shooting Game 3D
description:
The hunting fever is at the high so grab the hunting gun and go for a Duck Hunting Adventure Season.Feel like as the real hunter and hunt the ducks in the beautiful real environment of the lake side with the realistic sound effects. Complete the wave of hunting ducks and get a lot of other lush environments with number of guns. By using that guns you can hunt the ducks more accurately.
Duck Hunting Adventure Season has a great game play and will give you the feeling that you are a real hunter. Duck Hunting Adventure Season is all about precision, aiming and timing. Don’t forget to pull the trigger otherwise you’ll will never hunt the ducks.
If you like hunting games you definitely should play this game and you will enjoy it for a long time.

Game Features:
- First person 3D Shooting
- Efficient Weapon control
- 3D Graphics and Sound Effects
- Real time Duck Hunting with animations
- Multiple Levels
